greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Bisection of Kolakoski sequence A000002.
comment: Lengths of runs of twos in A000002. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 03 2013
As in the Kolakoski sequence itself, the length of runs in this sequence is 1 or 2 (see A100428). - _Jean-Christophe Hervé_, Oct 04 2014
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a100429_list = g a000002_list where g (_:v:vs) = v : g vs
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 20 2004
